模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble

类 GameObject

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
com.example.BubbleBobble.GameObject
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
Bubble, Fruit, GameCharacter, ProjectileShape, SpecialItem, Unit
public abstract class GameObject extends javafx.scene.Node
GameObjects are the objects on the InteractableWorld screen. Every GameObject has a velocity, acceleration, position, direction, and dimensions. GameObjects can detect if they are overlapping another GameObject and must implement methods for collisions with every type of Unit.

  • 属性概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int width, int height)
      First constructor for creating a game object (according to int value of the column and row)
      参数:
      world - interactable world parameter
      colNum - number of column
      rowNum - number of row
      width - width of the object
      height - height of the object

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(int x, int y, int width, int height, InteractableWorld world)
      Second Constructor of creating a game object (according to specific x and y parameter of the object)
      参数:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      width - width of the object
      height - height of the object
      world - an interactable world.

      public boolean overlaps​(GameObject obj)
      check if two objects overlap or collide
      参数:
      obj - the object to check whether overlap or collide
      返回:
      a boolean true for collide and false for not collide
